name: 2310D3B0
description:
2310D3B0 is local multiplayer game where two players control the same character. One player takes the role of the human, who has been possessed by a demon and must survive until the demon leaves his body. The other player is the demon who has to kill the human while he is possessing him.
There are many objects throughout the map that the human has to dispose to stay safe while trying to not expose himself to danger, and the demon can take advantage of the environment and use objects to take the human's life.

FAQ

  • What's up with the weird name?
    • After a year in development we still haven't found a name that fits the game, so we chose 2310D3B0 as a temporal name. Any name suggestions are appreciated (and if we chose a name suggested by someone we will add them to the spacial thanks in the credits of the game).
  • Does the game have online multiplayer?
    • No, it's local multiplayer only, but there are services like Parsec that let you play local multiplayer games online and we have tested them and have found that they work really well.
  • Are you going to update the game in the future?
    • Yes, but it may take some time. We are two students that make videogames on their free time so we don't have a lot of time to work on the game but we have big plans for the future.
  • I like the game and want to support you, how can I do this?
    • We don't accept donations at the moment but you can support us by following us on twitter: CursedFiles (R3N, D)
  • I found a glitch and/or I have an idea that you could add to the game
    • Please @ us on twitter with the problem or idea (images are appreciated)
